explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the impact of mergers and acquisitions (M&A) on the risk profile of insurance companies and the role of CEO power in this context. It uses linear regression with two-stage least squares instrumental variables for analysis. None of the provided keywords related to machine learning, deep learning, or other AI techniques are mentioned or implied in the title or abstract. The study is grounded in financial and managerial analysis rather than computational or data-driven methodologies.
